## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Language change (new syntax, grammar modification)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Checklist

- [ ] `bazel build //...` passes
- [ ] `bazel test //...` passes
- [ ] `bazel run //:gazelle` run (if files added/removed)
- [ ] New feature includes example in `examples/` with `.gala` and `.out` files
- [ ] Documentation updated (`docs/GALA.MD`, `docs/EXAMPLES.MD`, etc.)
